Articles.Content:
Hi everyone! ;D

I\'m Scruce and I made an account here when HarvesteR advertised Kerbal Space Program on Orbiter-Forum, I\'ve had this account for two months but finally got it working today because of login problems.

What is this \'Orbinaut\' you speak of?

I\'ve seen a few threads on here talking about Orbiter Space Flight Simulator, that\'s where I\'m from. It\'s a realistic simulation of activities in the Solar System, but sometimes it is nowhere near as interesting as Kerbal Space Program.

I\'m an Addon Developer, I can create meshes textures and configurations. I made some addons for Spaceway and Orbiter.

Also, I\'ve helped a lot recently on Kerbal Space Program Wiki. That place needs a little loving right now!

Scruce.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Man, its been forever since I have even touched Orbiter. I may have to check it out again one of these days.

Welcome to the forums! 8)

Welcome to the forums!

Hope you don\'t fail as much as me!

JupiterII
